barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to Mateo Ahumada, September 8, 1825. Concerning hostilities of Comanches and poor preparation of the colonists for war.

*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Mateo Ahumada, September 8, 1825. Concerning hostilities of Comanches and poor preparation of the colonists for war.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Your communication of the *date_mentioned n="08-19-1825">19th of August last*/date_mentioned*, received *date_mentioned n="09-07-1825">yesterday*/date_mentioned*, has acquainted me with the breach of peace committed by the *person_mentioned*Comanches*/person_mentioned*, and apprizes me that the *person_mentioned*Tahuacanos */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Tahuiases*/person_mentioned* have joined them in that savage and unjust war, and killed the *person_mentioned*American*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Dickenson*/person_mentioned*. You instruct me to adopt every possible measure, that I may be ready in case they should extend their hos- tilities to the limit of the establishment in my charge; to pursue them, and take satisfaction for any outrages they may commit.*/p*
*p*The actual situation of this *location_mentioned*Establishment */location_mentioned*is by no means well calculated to meet the commencement of a war, owing to the reasons already expressed in my communication of *date_mentioned n="08-20-1825">August 20th*/date_mentioned*, and *date_mentioned n="09-08-1825">September the 8th*/date_mentioned* to the *person_mentioned*Political Chief of the Department*/person_mentioned*. Nevertheless we are all ready to obey, and to attack any people considered as *person_mentioned*enemies */person_mentioned*by the *person_mentioned*government*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*I will lose no time in adopting such measures as our circumstances permit for either attack upon or defence against the *person_mentioned*enemy*/person_mentioned*. I have, in fact, already ordered the *person_mentioned*militia */person_mentioned*to be in readiness to march at the earliest notice, and I shall not omit to report to you any new occurrences.*/p*
*p*God and Liberty. *person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="09-08-1825">September 8th, 1825*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
